layer at (0,0) size 320x483
  RenderView at (0,0) size 320x483
layer at (0,0) size 320x483
  RenderBlock {HTML} at (0,0) size 320x483
    RenderBody {BODY} at (8,8) size 304x467
      RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 0x0
layer at (8,8) size 289x192
  RenderInline {SPAN} at (0,0) size 289x192 [bgcolor=#808080]
    RenderText {#text} at (75,22) size 289x100
      text run at (75,22) width 214: "This content should"
      text run at (0,94) width 118: "be masked"
    RenderBR {BR} at (117,116) size 1x0
    RenderText {#text} at (0,166) size 176x28
      text run at (0,166) width 176: "with a soft glow."
